1110111100110011 0011011110000100 0 -> sum: 0010011010110111, cout: 1
0010100011010000 0101110001000110 0 -> sum: 1000010100010110, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
